How long does it take to bake a pumpkin pie?
In: Lifestyle › Food&Drink › Pumpkin Pie
Rate This Answer
Pumpkin Pie bakes in preheated oven for 45 minutes, or until set in center. Want the recipe? Happy Thanksgiving! ChaCha on! Answered

Facebook Tweet Email Advertisement About Pumpkin Pie
Pumpkin pie is a traditional American dessert usually eaten for Thanksgiving and Christmas. It is usually created from a pumpkin-based custard and a pie shell with no top.
